data.label: 快手开放平台
data.description: 致力于将快手在短视频和直播领域积累的技术能力与资源开放给广大开发者们，以合作互惠的方式共建快手生态。

data.label: Kuaishou Open Platform
data.description: Dedicated to opening up Kuaishou's accumulated technical capabilities and resources in the short video and live streaming fields to a wide range of developers, jointly building the Kuaishou ecosystem through mutually beneficial cooperation.
